verbs.description: [ARG1: redhead emojis] [V: are] [ARG2: here] but not everyone is pleased apple just released over 70 emojis with the new ios 12 1 update this update includes more hair options and even new smiley faces but what got the most people talking is the excitement of the new hair additions curly bald now there even an emoji for redheads that right the ginger in your life can now get representation in emoji form and a lot of people were pretty thrilled about it facebook apple virginia
